thread.title: ‘Graveyard of Ships’ kayak tour in New York (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: ‘Graveyard of Ships’ kayak tour in New York (VIDEO)

title: ‘Graveyard of Ships’ kayak tour in New York (VIDEO)
text:
‘Graveyard of Ships’ kayak tour in New York (VIDEO) Saturday July 11, 2015 Print Article 
NEW YORK, July 11 — Kayakers wind through a marine salvage yard in New York City that's the final resting place for dozens of decayed boats and military vessels. 
The “Graveyard of Ships” tour often sells out and is far more popular than other paddling trips to nearby views of panoramic rivers and lakes run by Kayak East tour operator John Pagani. — Reuters Image of an abandoned ship at the New York marine yard from the Reuters video. More Stories for You:
